column3: 这是比较正规的用法。向……提出警告通常用 give sb. a acution. 或 caution sb.
column4: The referee stops the game to administer the caution.
column5: 裁判员为了提出警告而暂停比赛。

column2: AFC 亚洲足球联合会的缩写
column3: 全称 abbreviation for Asian Football Confederation

column2: 凶狠积极或主动积极的打法
拼抢凶狠积极的队员，风格凶狠的队员

column4: 预见到（预料到）对方的行动
The team appealed against the decision.
column5: 这个队员对判决（决议）提出上诉。
column7: to make an appeal / to lodge an appeal
column11: An appeal may be lodged with the Board of Appeal within a period of five days.
column12: 上诉可在 5 天内向上诉委员会提出。
column13: If the appeal is sustained, the fee shall be refunded to the Association making the appeal.
column14: 如果上诉被认可，手续费将归还上诉的协会。

column2: 亚洲足球联合会（缩写为：AFC）

column3: Although the player didn't find the net himself, he made four assists.
column4: 虽然这个球员本身没有破门得分，但他进行了四次有效助攻。

column9: 他们开始（发动）快速进攻
column10: They launched direct attacks through the middle.
column11: 他们通过中路多次发动直接进攻。
column12: Spain started out with a furious attack and pinned their opponents down for the first few minutes.
column13: 西班牙队一开始就展开猛烈攻势，在开场几分钟内将对手压制住。
column14: Their tactics were clear and simple: from a strengthened defensive position they would launch quick attacks to surprise and defeat their opponents.
column15: 他们的战术简单明了，先加强防御，然后快速发动进攻，出其不意，击败对手。
column16: Attack after rolled towards the Polish goal, but the East Europeans' defence was well organized and resisted the Spanish pressure.
column17: 尽管波兰队的大门遭到对方轮番攻击，但是他们防守严密，顶住了西班牙队的压力。
column20: 一有机会就发动进攻（主动积极进攻）
column21: The team attacked their opponents' goal.

column2: 从两翼进攻；从两侧进攻

column3: All four teams played positive attacking football.
column4: 这四个队都打积极主动的攻势足球。
column5: This victory restored one's belief in attacking football.
column6: 这次胜利使人们恢复了对攻势足球的信心。
column7: This match was an impressive demonstration of modern attacking football.
column8: 这场比赛是一次扣人心弦的现代进攻足球的示范表演。

column3: No blocking tactics were considered from the first minute, attacking play was the dominant factor.
column4: 一开场双方均不考虑采用堵截的打法，进攻型的打法在这场比赛中起到了主导作用。
column5: Attacking play is concerned eith advancing the ball upfield and scoring goals.
column6: 进攻型打法是将球堆向前场破门得分的一种打法。

column5: They showed a lot of courage to take risk in the attacking third.
column6: 他们敢于在前场冒险，反映出他们有很大的勇气。
column7: The Scots were prepared to win the ball back in the attacking third.
column8: 苏格兰队准备在前场把球夺回来。

column2: 以进攻为主的，进攻型的
column6: 西拔牙是一支进攻型的球队。
